Provides.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share scope. When provided, property name is used as share key, otherwise share key is automatically inferred from request.

items.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share scope.

ProvidesConfig.description: Advanced configuration for modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share scope.

eager.description: Include the provided module directly instead behind an async request. This allows to use this shared module in initial load too. All possible shared modules need to be eager too.

anyOf.description: Version number. It's assumed that the module is compatible with any higher version number.
Version tag. The module is only compatible with the exact matching version tag.
Version as string. Each part of the version should be separated by a dot '.'.

ProvidesItem.description: Request to a module that should be provided as shared module to the share scope.

ProvidesObject.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share scope. Property names are used as share keys.

additionalProperties.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share scope.

shareScope.description: Share scope name used for all provided modules (defaults to 'default').
